SELECT cr_issue.*, cr_module.module_name as moduleName, cr_project.project_name as projectName, t_sys_org.name as orgName , ( SELECT count(*) FROM cr_issue_note WHERE cr_issue.id = cr_issue_note.issue_id ) AS replyNum
from cr_issue left join t_sys_org on t_sys_org.id = cr_issue.org_id LEFT JOIN cr_module on cr_module.id = cr_issue.module_id LEFT JOIN cr_project on cr_project.id = cr_module.project_id
WHERE 1=1 and cr_issue.create_by = #{userId}
AND cr_issue.module_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.moduleId},'%')
AND cr_module.module_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.moduleName},'%')
AND cr_project.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.projectName},'%')
AND cr_issue.create_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createBy},'%')
AND cr_issue.create_by_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createByName},'%')
AND cr_issue.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.title},'%')
AND cr_issue.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND cr_issue.priority LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.priority},'%')
AND cr_issue.status = #{record.status}
AND cr_issue.create_time >= date(#{startTime}) AND cr_issue.create_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{endTime}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
order by cr_issue.priority DESC,cr_issue.create_time DESC
